action.text: Motion to table the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 195 with an amendment (SA 1903) agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 1903 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S305; text: CR S305) To change the enactment date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1903 proposed by Senator McConnell.
